Title: Maldra's in Hot Water
Description:
Excellent work. While you were off disrupting things I was scouting the camp. I did not expect to find my old friend Maldra Flametongue.

I knew she was missing, but the rumors said she had joined the rebels. From what I could see, though, she is their captive!

We cannot leave her here. Rescue her from the dragonspawn holding her captive!
PortraitGiverText: This rebel leader has shackled his captive, Maldra Flametongue, with binding chains of primal water.
RewardText: I am indebted to you for rescuing my friend.
